alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 9:44AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 16 inches, with 1 to 2 feet along Montana Highway 56 Bull Lake Road. * WHERE...Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, and Highway 37 Eureka to Libby. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
